aboutFilip.label: Your Guide
aboutFilip.title: Meet Filip, Your Prague Storyteller
aboutFilip.description1: Born and raised in Prague, Filip has been sharing the magic of his city for over 12 years. As a licensed guide with a passion for storytelling, he transforms every tour into an unforgettable journey through time.
aboutFilip.description2: From the legends of Prague Castle to the mysteries of the Old Town, Filip's authentic narratives reveal the soul of Prague that guidebooks can't capture.
aboutFilip.quote: Every stone in Prague has a story to tell. My job is to help you listen.

seo.title: Prague Tours | Authentic Walking Tours with Filip Kareta
seo.description: Explore Prague with authentic walking tours led by local guide Filip Kareta. Choose from Prague Castle, Old Town, Jewish Quarter tours and more. Book your storytelling adventure today.

about.title: About Filip
about.subtitle: Your local storytelling guide
about.description1: With over 10 years of experience guiding visitors through Prague's enchanting streets, Filip brings history to life through captivating stories and local insights that you won't find in any guidebook.
about.description2: Born and raised in Prague, Filip has an intimate knowledge of the city's hidden gems, legendary tales, and cultural nuances that make each tour a unique and memorable experience.
about.credential2: Fluent in English, German, and Czech
